alert.note: Alert for McDowell (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Buchanan and southern McDowell Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 240 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jewell Ridge, or 10 miles north of Richlands, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gary, War, Anawalt, Maybeury, Elbert, Jolo, Cucumber and Jenkinjones. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
